metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5805 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
A boundary error within the "quicktake_100_load_raw()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.8 can beexploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow and subsequently cause acrash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.1
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.1').
ufraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
